contents: Not every Chinese Canadians.  Currently we have nearly 1.7 M "Chinese Canadians" . 0.4M were born in Canada before 2000 and most of them do not speak Chinese. 0.4M were from HK, 0.1M were from TW and 10K "Chinese Canadians" were from Singapore. Yes, the most part of "Chinese Canadian" have Mainland background, but not all of them support CCP.  Still, be careful of the influence from CCP.
